8 #include <rktl_perception/ball_detection.h>

10 namespace rktl_perception {
11 
12 int getMaxAreaContourId(std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point>> contours);
13 
14 BallDetection::BallDetection(const ros::NodeHandle& nh, const ros::NodeHandle& pnh)
15  : _nh(nh), _pnh(pnh), _it(nh) {
16  _vecPub = _nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3Stamped>("ball_vec", 10);
17  _imgPub = _it.advertise("threshold_img", 1);
18  _cameraSub = _it.subscribeCamera("image_rect_color", 10, &BallDetection::ballCallback, this);
19  // future plan for this node is to make all of these adjustable with dynamic_reconfigure
20  _publishThresh = _pnh.param<bool>("publishThresh", false);
21  _minHue = _pnh.param<int>("min_hue", 050);
22  _maxHue = _pnh.param<int>("max_hue", 100);
23  _minSat = _pnh.param<int>("min_sat", 075);
24  _maxSat = _pnh.param<int>("max_sat", 180);
25  _minVib = _pnh.param<int>("min_vib", 040);
26  _maxVib = _pnh.param<int>("max_vib", 100);
27  _minSize = _pnh.param<int>("min_size", 50);
28  _erodeAmnt = _pnh.param<int>("erode", 4);
29  _dilateAmnt = _pnh.param<int>("dilate", 5);
30 }
31 
32 void BallDetection::ballCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg,
33  const sensor_msgs::CameraInfoConstPtr& info) {
34  try {
35  /* define published vector */
36  geometry_msgs::Vector3Stamped vec;
37 
38  /* Convert the ROS message into a cv_ptr & dereferencing the pointer to an OpenCV Mat */
39  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, "bgr8");
40  cv::Mat current_frame = cv_ptr->image;
41  cv::Mat frame_HSV, frame_threshold;
42 
43  /* Convert from BGR to HSV colorspace */
44  cvtColor(current_frame, frame_HSV, cv::COLOR_BGR2HSV);
45 
46  /* get image size */
47  int h = current_frame.size().height;
48  int w = current_frame.size().width;
49 
50  /* Detect the object based on HSV Range Values */
51  inRange(frame_HSV, cv::Scalar(_minHue, _minSat, _minVib),
52  cv::Scalar(_maxHue, _maxSat, _maxVib), frame_threshold);
53  erode(frame_threshold, frame_threshold, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), _erodeAmnt, 1, 1);
54  dilate(frame_threshold, frame_threshold, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), _dilateAmnt, 1, 1);
55 
56  /* find all the contours */
57  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point>> contours;
58  std::vector<cv::Vec4i> hierarchy;
59  findContours(frame_threshold, contours, hierarchy, cv::RETR_TREE, cv::CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
60 
61  /* only find the center if there are detections */
62  if (contours.size() != 0) {
63  /* find largest contour */
64  std::vector<cv::Point> largestContour = contours.at(getMaxAreaContourId(contours));
65  cv::Moments moment = cv::moments(largestContour);
66  double largestContourArea = cv::contourArea(largestContour);
67  /* do not include contours below a certain size */
68  if (largestContourArea < _minSize)
69  return;
70 
71  /* calculates the center of the contour*/
72  double centerX = moment.m10 / moment.m00;
73  double centerY = moment.m01 / moment.m00;
74  double centerdX = (w / 2) - centerX;
75  double centerdY = (h / 2) - centerY;
76 
77  /* create camera model and project the pixel to a vector */
78  _camera.fromCameraInfo(info);
79  cv::Point3d cam = _camera.projectPixelTo3dRay(cv::Point2d(centerX, centerY));
80 
81  /* create the vector to publish */
82  vec.vector.x = cam.x;
83  vec.vector.y = cam.y;
84  vec.vector.z = largestContourArea;
85 
86  /* publish the location vector */
87  vec.header = msg->header;
88  _vecPub.publish(vec);
89 
90  /* debug the size of the countour */
91  ROS_INFO("Size of the largest ball: %.0f\n", largestContourArea);
92 
93  /* publishes the threshold image */
94  if (_publishThresh) {
95  sensor_msgs::Image threshImg;
96  std_msgs::Header header;
97  cv_bridge::CvImage img_bridge;
98  header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
99  img_bridge = cv_bridge::CvImage(header, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8,
100  frame_threshold);
101  img_bridge.toImageMsg(threshImg);
102  _imgPub.publish(threshImg);
103  }
104  }
105  } catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e) {
106  ROS_ERROR("There was some error, likely with image conversion");
107  }
108 }
109 
110 int getMaxAreaContourId(std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point>> contours) {
111  /* calculates the area of each contour and then returns the largest one */
112  double maxArea = 0;
113  int maxAreaContourId = -1;
114  for (int j = 0; j < contours.size(); j++) {
115  double newArea = cv::contourArea(contours.at(j));
116  if (newArea > maxArea) {
117  maxArea = newArea;
118  maxAreaContourId = j;
119  }
120  }
121  return maxAreaContourId;
122 }
123
